author: coliver
msg: Created a transformer adapter for JXTemplate (JXTemplateTransformer and changed JXTemplate's namespace to http://cocoon.apache.org/templates/jx/1.0. Modified sample application accordingly

author: haul
msg: In case an attribute name contained a wildcard "*" all matching attributes
are combined into one, but order was random.
Now, all matching names are ordered alphabetically and values are combined
